FRFR: Inclut tout, la réponse finale à la théorie du tout, la résolution de l'ultime mystère de l'univers !

Name: I空间翘曲器
ZHCN:
消耗品，用来激活机甲和星际物流运输船的曲速飞行。
使用<color="#FD965ECC">CapsLock</color>键启动曲速引擎。
ENUS:
Consumables. Used to activate warp of mecha and logistics vessels.
Use the <color="#FD965ECC">CapsLock</color> key to start the warp engine.
FRFR:
Consommables, utilisés pour activer la Distorsion des Mécas et des navires logistiques.
Utilisez la touche <color="#FD965ECC">CapsLock</color> pour démarrer le moteur de Distorsion.

Name: I奇异物质
ZHCN: 奇异物质具有极大的引力负压，超过了它的能量密度，从而使得奇异物质周围的空间翘曲，满足了曲速引擎的负能量需求。
ENUS: Strange matter has a great gravitational negative pressure, which exceeds its energy density, so that the space around the strange matter is warped and meets the negative energy demand of the warp engine.
FRFR: La Matière Étrange a une haute pression gravitationnelle négative, qui dépasse sa densité énergétique, de sorte que l'espace autour de la matière étrange est déformé et répond à la demande d'énergie négative du moteur de Distorsion.

Name: R等离子精炼
ZHCN: 利用等离子体精炼原油，可以获得氢气和精炼油。
ENUS: Hydrogen and refined oil can be obtained by refining crude oil with plasma.
FRFR: Le raffinage du pétrole au plasma permet de produire de l'hydrogène et du pétrole raffiné.

Name: RX射线裂解
ZHCN: 在氢气的催化作用下，利用X射线将精炼油裂解，从而获得更多的氢以及副产品高能石墨。
ENUS: Under the catalysis of hydrogen, X-rays can crack the refined oil into more hydrogen and a by-product, energetic graphite.
FRFR: Sous la catalyse de l'hydrogène, les rayons X peuvent décomposer le pétrole raffiné en plus d'hydrogène et en un sous-produit, le graphite énergétique.

Name: R卡西米尔晶体（高效）
ZHCN: 使用稀有矿物光栅石来制造卡西米尔晶体，效率更高。
ENUS: The use of rare ore optical grating crystal to make Casimir crystal is more efficient.
FRFR: L'utilisation d'un minerai rare de Roche à Réseau Optique pour fabriquer le cristal Casimir est plus efficace.

Name: R石墨烯（高效）
ZHCN: 找到可燃冰矿，制造石墨烯就会变得容易许多。
ENUS: It will be a lot easier to produce graphene if you can find combustible ice minerals.
FRFR: Si vous trouver de la Glace Combustible, ce sera beaucoup plus facile pour produire du Graphène.

Name: R碳纳米管（高效）
ZHCN: 可以用刺笋结晶来制造碳纳米管，只是这种矿物很稀有，很不容易找到。
ENUS: Carbon nanotube can be made directly from spiniform stalagmite crystal, but this ore is extremely rare and difficult to find.
FRFR: Le Nanotube de Carbone peut être fabriqué directement à partir d'un Cristal de Stalagmite spiniforme, mais ce minerai est extrêmement rare et difficile à trouver.

Name: R晶格硅（高效）
ZHCN: 分形硅石具有的独特分形结构，是高效制造晶格硅的首选材料。
ENUS: The unique fractal structure of Fractal silicon is the material of choice for the efficient production of Crystal silicon.
FRFR: La structure fractale unique du Silicium Fractal est le matériau idéal pour la production efficace de Silicium Cristallin.

Name: R金刚石（高效）
ZHCN: 找到金伯利矿石，直接冶炼就可以获得金刚石。
ENUS: Find Kimberlite ore and smelt directly to obtain diamond.
FRFR: Trouvez du minerai de Kimberlite et fondez-le directement pour obtenir du diamant.

Name: R光子合并器（高效）
ZHCN: 光栅石的发现，使光子合并器的制造更加方便。
ENUS: The discovery of optical grating crystal has diversified the production of Photon combiner.
FRFR: La découverte de la Roche à Réseau Optique a permis de diversifier la production du combinateur de photons.

Name: R光子物质化
ZHCN: 在超级磁场的作用下可以将临界光子逆变为反物质和氢。
ENUS: Photons can be inverted into antimatter and hydrogen under the effect of super magnetic field.
FRFR: Les photons peuvent être inversés en antimatière et en hydrogène sous l'effet d'un super champ magnétique.

Name: R粒子容器（高效）
ZHCN: 虽然单极磁石极其稀有，不过只要找到它，就能更加高效的制造粒子容器。
ENUS: Although the Unipolar magnet is extremely rare, as long as you find it, you can make Particle container more efficiently.
FRFR: Bien que le Magnet Unipolaire soit extrêmement rare, pour autant que vous en trouviez, vous pouvez fabriquer un Conteneur de Particules plus efficacement.

Name: R重氢分馏
ZHCN: 从液态氢中成功的分馏出重氢，极大的推动了核燃料的使用。
ENUS: The successful fractionation of deuterium from liquid hydrogen has greatly promoted the use of nuclear fuel.
FRFR: Le fractionnement réussi du deutérium à partir de l'hydrogène liquide a grandement favorisé l'utilisation du combustible nucléaire.

Name: R空间翘曲器（高级）
ZHCN: 有了引力矩阵，空间翘曲器的制造变得更加容易。
ENUS: With the Gravity matrix, the production of the space warper becomes easier.
FRFR: Avec la Matrice de Gravité, la génération de Distorsion Spatiale devient plus facile.

Name: R有机晶体（原始）
ZHCN: 加工木材、植物燃料、水这三种资源，可以获得有机晶体。
ENUS: Organic crystal can be obtained by processing the three resources of wood, plant fuel and water.
FRFR: Le Cristal Organique peut être obtenu en transformant les trois ressources que sont le bois, le combustible végétal et l'eau.

Name: 系统播报字幕1
ENUS: Arrived in the designated cluster XXXXXXXX-XX

Name: 系统播报字幕2
ZHCN: 请注意，飞行舱即将在目标星球降落！3......2......1
ENUS: Attention! The Space capsule is about to land on the designated planet. Three......Two......One
FRFR: Attention ! La Capsule Spatiale est sur le point d'atterrir sur la planète cible. Trois...... Deux...... Un

Name: 顾问字幕1
ZHCN: 欢迎来到真实宇宙！很快，你就会发现这里和我们的家园不一样，不过你应该能快速适应这里的物理定律。我是你的顾问，会协助你完成此次任务。
ENUS: Welcome to the Actual Universe! You may find it is different from our homeland, should you be able to adapt to the laws of physics in a short time. I am your advisor and will help you through this mission.
FRFR: Bienvenue dans l'univers réel. Vous constaterez qu'il est différent de notre pays, mais vous devriez pouvoir vous adapter rapidement aux lois de la physique en ce lieu. Je suis votre consultant et je vous aiderai dans cette tâche.

Name: 顾问字幕2
ZHCN:
这里的一切都是你的！作为COSMO的一员、戴森球计划的先驱，你将白手起家，逐步探索这片星区，并利用这里的资源建造戴森球，为主脑提供维持家园的能量。


我已为你选择好任务开始的目标行星，那里有初期发展的必要资源。现在，请驾驶飞行舱前往这颗星球。
ENUS: Everything here is yours! As one of COSMO and the pioneer of the Dyson Sphere Program, you will explore this cluster step by step, by using the resources here to construct the Dyson Sphere to provide energy for the CentreBrain to maintain homeland, starting from scratch. I have chosen a designated planet for you to start the mission, which has necessary resources for initial development. Now please drive the Space Capsule to the planet.
FRFR:
Tout ici est à vous. En tant que membre de COSMO et pionnier du programme de la Sphère de Dyson, vous partirez de zéro, explorerez progressivement cet amas et utiliserez ses ressources pour construire la Sphère de Dyson, afin de fournir l'énergie qui sera nécessaire au CerveauCentral pour maintenir le pays.
J'ai choisi la planète cible pour commencer la mission, et il y a les ressources nécessaires pour le développement initial.
Maintenant, veuillez conduire la capsule spatiale jusqu'à cette planète.

Name: 顾问字幕3
ZHCN: 现在，你即将抵达目标行星！
ENUS: Now you are about to reach the designated planet!
FRFR: Vous êtes maintenant sur le point d'atteindre la planète cible !

Name: 顾问字幕4
ZHCN: 这是伊卡洛斯，一台轻型工业机甲，功能强大。使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[方向键]</color>，或者<color="#61D8FFc0">[鼠标右键]</color>点击空地，可以控制它移动。此次任务中，你将操控它遨游星海，构建奇迹。
ENUS: This is Icarus, a lightweight industrial mecha with powerful functionality. You can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Direction keys]</color> or <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right-click]</color> on the destination to control its movement. In this mission, you will manipulate Icarus to travel beyond the stars and create miracles.
FRFR: Voici Icare, un Méca de l'industrie légère aux fonctions puissantes. Vous pouvez contrôler ses mouvements en utilisant les <color="#61D8FFc0">[touches fléchées]</color> ou <color="#61D8FFc0">[clic droit]</color> sur la destination. Dans cette mission, vous le manipulerez pour voyager dans les étoiles et faire des miracles.

Name: 顾问字幕5
ZHCN: 你可以按住<color="#61D8FFc0">[鼠标中键]</color>拖动，来旋转视角，也可以滑动<color="#61D8FFc0">[鼠标滚轮]</color>拉近拉远。
ENUS: You can hold down <color="#61D8FFc0">[Mouse Middle Button]</color> drag to rotate the angle of view or slide the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Mouse Wheel]</color> to zoom in and out.
FRFR: Vous pouvez maintenir enfoncé la <color="#61D8FFc0">[molette de la souris]</color> pour faire pivoter l'angle de vue; ou faire rouler la <color="#61D8FFc0">[molette de la souris]</color> pour effectuer un zoom avant ou arrière.

Name: 顾问字幕6
ZHCN: 现在请尝试回收飞行舱，使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[鼠标右键]</color>点击它便可以进行回收。
ENUS: Now try to recycle the Space Capsule, <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right-click]</color> on it to recycle.
FRFR: Maintenant, essayez de récupérer la Capsule Spatiale, <color="#61D8FFc0">[clic droit]</color> sur celle-ci pour la récupérer.

Name: 顾问字幕7
ZHCN: 你可以使用相同的操作来采集资源，例如树木、碎石等。另外，按住<color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT+右键点击]</color>可以下达一连串的指令。
ENUS: You can use the same operation to collect resources, such as trees, gravels, etc. In the meantime, hold down <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT and Right-click]</color> to give a series of commands.
FRFR: Vous pouvez utiliser la même opération pour collecter des ressources, telles que des arbres, des graviers, etc. En outre, en maintenant la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT + clic droit]</color> enfoncée, vous pouvez donner une série de commandes.

Name: 顾问字幕8
ZHCN: 飞行舱回收后获得了一些物品，点击屏幕右下角的<color="#61D8FFc0">“物品清单（E）</color>”按钮打开机舱便可以查看。
ENUS: You receive several items after recycling the Space Capsule. Click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Inventory (E)</color> button in the lower-right corner of the screen to open the Cabin to view them.
FRFR: Vous obtenez certains objets après avoir récupéré la Capsule Spatiale. Cliquez sur le bouton <color="#61D8FFc0">Inventaire (E)</color> dans le coin inférieur droit de l'écran pour ouvrir la cabine et les visualiser.

Name: 顾问字幕9
ZHCN: 机甲的一切活动都需要消耗能量，当能量耗尽时，活动将会受到限制。你可以点击屏幕右下方的<color="#61D8FFc0">“机体面板（C）”</color>按钮打开“机体信息面板”，并向燃料仓内补充燃料。
ENUS: Energy is required in all mecha activities, if it is depleted, the activities will be restricted. You can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Mecha panel (C)</color> button at the bottom-right of the screen to open the Mecha panel and resupply fuel into the fuel chamber.
FRFR: Toutes les activités du Méca nécessitent de l'énergie. Lorsque l'énergie est épuisée, les activités sont limitées. Vous pouvez cliquer sur le bouton <color="#61D8FFc0">Panneau Méca (C)</color> en bas à droite de l'écran pour ouvrir le Panneau Méca et refaire le plein de carburant.

Name: 顾问字幕10
ZHCN: 你尚未解锁建造菜单，完成一项科技研究后将会自动解锁。点击屏幕右下方的<color="#61D8FFc0">“科技树（T）”</color>按钮打开“科技树”，激活一项研究。
ENUS: Yet you have not unlocked the Construction Menu which will be done automatically when complete any technology research. Click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Technology tree (T)</color> button at the bottom-right of the screen to open the Technology tree and activate a research.
FRFR: Vous n'avez pas déverrouillé le menu de Construction qui sera déverrouillé automatiquement après avoir terminé une Recherche technologique. Cliquez sur le bouton <color="#61D8FFc0">Arbre Technologique (T)</color> en bas à droite de l'écran pour ouvrir l'"Arbre Technologique" et activer une recherche.

Name: 顾问字幕11
ZHCN: 当前需要的物品不足，你可以点击屏幕右下方的<color="#61D8FFc0">“制造面板（F）”</color>按钮打开合成器来手动合成这些物品。
ENUS: Insufficient required items! You can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Replicator (F)</color> button at the bottom-right of the screen to open the panel and manually replicate these items.
FRFR: Il n'y a pas assez d'objets actuellement nécessaires. Vous pouvez cliquer sur le bouton <color="#61D8FFc0">Replicator (F)</color> en bas à droite de l'écran pour ouvrir le panneau et reproduire manuellement ces objets.

Name: 顾问字幕12
ZHCN: 你获得了<color="#61D8FFc0">采矿机</color>，它可以为你自动采集矿物，从<color="#61D8FFc0">物品清单（E）</color>里或者在<color="#61D8FFc0">采集（2）</color>建造菜单里拿起它便可以建造。
ENUS: You have created a <color="#61D8FFc0">mining machine</color> to achieve ore collecting automation, pick it up from the <color="#61D8FFc0">Inventory (E)</color>, or select it on <color="#61D8FFc0">Gathering (2)</color> of Construction Menu to build it.
FRFR: Vous avez obtenu une <color="#61D8FFc0">Machine Minière.</color> Elle peut automatiquement collecter des minéraux pour vous. Récupérez-la dans <color="#61D8FFc0">Inventaire</color>, ou bien dans, le menu de Construction. Choisissez ensuite un emplacement sur la carte pour la construire.

Name: 顾问字幕13
ZHCN: 你可以使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[R]</color>键来旋转采矿机以覆盖更多的矿脉，覆盖的矿脉越多，产出矿物的速度就越快。如果想要忽略网格吸附，可以尝试按住<color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color>键。
ENUS: You can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[R]</color> key to rotate the mining machine for covering more veins. The more veins covered, the faster the ores will be gathered. If you want to ignore grid snapping, try holding down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key.
FRFR: Vous pouvez utiliser la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[R]</color> pour faire tourner la machine d'extraction afin de couvrir plus de veines. Plus il y a de veines couvertes, plus vite le minerai sera recueilli. Vous pouvez ignorer l’aimantation à la grille en maintenant la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> enfoncée.

Name: 顾问字幕14
ZHCN: 你有生产设施未通电！如果要保证设施正常运行，需要让它在<color="#61D8FFc0">电力覆盖范围</color>内，并有<color="#61D8FFc0">供电设施</color>提供电力。
ENUS: One of your production facility is not powered. You need to keep it <color="#61D8FFc0">within the power coverage area</color> and supply it with <color="#61D8FFc0">power facilities</color> in order to maintain its normal works.
FRFR: Vous avez une installation de production qui n'est pas alimentée en électricité. Pour que l'installation fonctionne, vous devez la maintenir <color="#61D8FFc0">dans la zone de couverture d’alimentation électrique</color> et disposer <color="#61D8FFc0">d'installations électriques</color> pour l'alimenter.

Name: 顾问字幕15
ZHCN: 风力涡轮机！你建立了第一个电网，不是每个发电设施都自带电力覆盖区域，你需要用<color="#61D8FFc0">电力感应塔</color>来扩展电网的供电范围。
ENUS: Wind turbine! You have established your first power grid. Not all power facility has its power supply area. Use the <color="#61D8FFc0">Tesla tower</color> to extend the area of the power grid.
FRFR: Une éolienne ! Vous avez mis en place le premier réseau électrique. Toutes les installations électriques n'ont pas leur zone d'alimentation. Utilisez la <color="#61D8FFc0">tour Tesla</color> pour étendre la zone d'alimentation du réseau électrique.

Name: 顾问字幕16
ZHCN: 你建造了第一个电力传输设施━━电力感应塔！它可以进行<color="#61D8FFc0">短距离</color>无线输电，并扩展电网的供电范围，点击它便可查看当前电网的信息。
ENUS: You have done building the first power transmission facility Tesla tower. It can carry out <color="#61D8FFc0">short-distance</color> wireless power transmission and expand the power supply area of the power grid. Click on it to view the current power grid information.
FRFR: Vous avez construit la première installation de transmission d'électricité, la Tour Tesla. Elle permet d'effectuer des transmissions d'énergie sans fil à <color="#61D8FFc0">courte distance</color> et d'étendre la zone d'alimentation du réseau électrique. Cliquez dessus pour voir les informations actuelles sur le réseau électrique.

Name: 顾问字幕17
ZHCN:
矩阵研究站，你可以使用它来<color="#61D8FFc0">制造超级矩阵</color>，也可以用它来<color="#61D8FFc0">研究需要超级矩阵才能解锁的科技。</color>


超级矩阵是主脑维持家园世界运行的源代码，你可以尽可能多的将超级矩阵上传至主脑，在维持家园世界的同时，也可以解锁更多真实世界中的科技。
ENUS: Matrix Lab! You can use it to <color="#61D8FFc0">make supermatrices</color> or <color="#61D8FFc0">research technologies that require them to unlock.</color> The supermatrices are the source code of the CentreBrain for maintaining the homeworld. You could upload as many supermatrices to the CentreBrain as possible. You can benefit to unlock more actual-world technologies by operating the homeworld simultaneously.
FRFR:
Labo de Matrice. Vous pouvez l'utiliser pour <color="#61D8FFc0">fabriquer des Supermatrices</color> ou <color="#61D8FFc0">des technologies de recherche qui nécessitent le déblocage de Supermatrices.</color>
Les Supermatrices sont le code source du CerveauCentral pour maintenir le monde virtuel. Vous pouvez télécharger autant de supermatrices que possible dans le CerveauCentral. Tout en gérant le Monde Virtuel, vous pouvez également débloquer d'autres technologies du monde réel.

Name: 顾问字幕18
ZHCN: 你建造了电弧熔炉，它可以自动冶炼出铁块、铜块等基础材料。不过，要想自动进出原料和产物，你需要使用<color="#61D8FFc0">分拣器</color>和<color="#61D8FFc0">传送带</color>。
ENUS: You built a smelter, which can smelt basic materials such as iron ingots and copper ingots automatically. While you want to make the raw materials and products get in and out of it autonomously, you need to use <color="#61D8FFc0">Sorters</color> and <color="#61D8FFc0">Conveyor Belts</color>.
FRFR: Vous avez construit une Fonderie, qui peut automatiquement fondre des matériaux de base tels que des lingots de fer et de cuivre. Si vous voulez entrer et sortir automatiquement des matières premières et des produits, vous devez utiliser des <color="#61D8FFc0">Trieuses</color> et des <color="#61D8FFc0">Tapis Roulants</color>.

Name: 顾问字幕19
ZHCN:
你有未设置配方的建筑，请设置你想要的配方，


设置好配方后，可以使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[＜]</color>键来复制当前建筑的配方，<color="#61D8FFc0">[＞]</color>键将该配方粘贴给下一个需要设置相同配方的建筑。
ENUS: You have a building without recipe set, please set the recipe you want. After selecting the recipe, you can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＜]</color> key to copy the recipe and the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＞]</color> key to paste to the next building that needs to set the same recipe.
FRFR: Vous avez une usine sans Plan de Production. Veuillez définir le Plan de Production que vous souhaitez. Après avoir sélectionné le Plan de Production, vous pouvez utiliser la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[＜]</color> pour copier le Plan et la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[＞]</color> pour le coller dans une autre usine.

Name: 顾问字幕20
ZHCN: 你获得了分拣器和传送带，现在可以实现全自动化了。利用<color="#61D8FFc0">传送带</color>可以将采矿机里堆积的矿物运送出来，而<color="#61D8FFc0">分拣器</color>可以将传送带上的矿物运送进电弧熔炉里自动冶炼。
ENUS: You have received the Sorter and the Conveyor Belt, which can achieve fully automation now. Use the <color="#61D8FFc0">Conveyor Belt</color> to transport the piled up ores from the mining machine, and the <color="#61D8FFc0">Sorter</color> can deliver the ores from the Conveyor Belt to the smelter for automatic smelting.
FRFR: Vous avez obtenu la Trieuse et le Tapis Roulant, qui peuvent maintenant être entièrement automatisés. Le <color="#61D8FFc0">Tapis Roulant</color> peut transporter les minerais accumulés dans la machine d'extraction, et la <color="#61D8FFc0">Trieuse</color> peut transporter les minerais sur le Tapis Roulant dans la Fonderie pour une fusion automatique.

Name: 顾问字幕21
ZHCN: 在搭建传送带时，只要确定好传送带的<color="#61D8FFc0">起始点</color>和<color="#61D8FFc0">终点</color>就可以了。另外，使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[↑]</color>可以将传送带升高一级，传送带升高后使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[↓]</color>可以将传送带下降一级，按 <color="#61D8FFc0">[Keypad.0]</color>可以将传送带的搭建高度重置至地面。如果不想传送带吸附到建筑，可以尝试按住<color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color>键。
ENUS: When putting a conveyor belt, all you need to do is determine the <color="#61D8FFc0">Starting point</color> and the <color="#61D8FFc0">Endpoint</color> of it. In addition, use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[↑]</color> key to lift up one level, and use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[↓]</color> key to drop down one level after the conveyor belt is lifted. Press <color="#61D8FFc0">[Keypad.0]</color> to reset the construction height of the conveyor belt to the ground. If you don't want the conveyor belt to be attached to the building, you can try holding down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key.
FRFR: Lors de la construction d'un Tapis Roulant, il suffit de déterminer le <color="#61D8FFc0">point de départ</color> et le <color="#61D8FFc0">point d'arrivée</color> du Tapis Roulant. De plus, utilisez la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[↑]</color> pour monter d'un niveau, et utilisez la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[↓]</color> pour descendre d'un niveau. Appuyez sur la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[Clavier 0]</color> pour réinitialiser la hauteur de construction du Tapis Roulant au sol. Si vous ne voulez pas que le Tapis Roulant soit fixé au bâtiment, vous pouvez maintenir la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> enfoncée.

Name: 顾问字幕22
ZHCN: 分拣器是设施之间货物运输的连接器，只要把<color="#61D8FFc0">供货设施和收货设施桥接起来</color>，分拣器就会自动运送货物。
ENUS: The Sorter is a transportation connector of cargos between facilities. It will automatically transport them <color="#61D8FFc0">as long as the supply facility and the receiving facility are bridged</color>.
FRFR: La Trieuse est un connecteur pour le transport des cargaisons entre les installations. <color="#61D8FFc0">Tant que l'installation d'approvisionnement et l'installation de réception sont reliées,</color> la Trieuse transporte automatiquement la cargaison.

Name: 顾问字幕23
ZHCN: 这个设施会产出多种产物，你需要通过<color="#61D8FFc0">给分拣器设置过滤器</color>来筛选他们。在建造分拣器时，可以使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[TAB]</color>，或者键盘右侧的<color="#61D8FFc0">[方向键]</color>来快速设置过滤器。
ENUS: This facility will produce multiple products, to divide them you need to <color="#61D8FFc0">set a filter on the Sorter</color>. You can use <color="#61D8FFc0">[TAB]</color> or the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Arrow keys]</color> on the right side of the keyboard to quickly set the filter When building the Sorter.
FRFR: Cette installation produira plusieurs produits différents, <color="#61D8FFc0">et vous devrez les filtrer en plaçant un filtre sur la Trieuse.</color> Vous pouvez utiliser la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[Tab]</color> ou les <color="#61D8FFc0">touches fléchées</color> sur le côté droit du clavier pour régler rapidement le filtre lors de la construction de la Trieuse.

Name: 顾问字幕24
ZHCN: 你建造了储液罐，它比储物仓更适合储存流体，每个储液罐只能储存一种流体，可垂直搭建。<color="#61D8FFc0">储液罐一旦被拆除，储存的流体会被销毁。</color>
ENUS: You built a Storage Tank, it is more suitable for storing fluid than the Storage. Each Storage Tank can only store one single type of fluid and can be built vertically. <color="#61D8FFc0">However, once it has been removed, all the stored fluid will be lost.</color>
FRFR: Vous construisez un Réservoir de Stockage, qui est plus adapté au stockage des fluides qu’un simple Entrepôt. Chaque Réservoir de Stockage ne peut stocker qu'un seul type de fluide et peut être construit verticalement. <color="#61D8FFc0">Une fois le Réservoir de Stockage enlevé, le fluide qui y est stocké disparaîtra.</color>

Name: 顾问字幕25
ZHCN:
你现在可以尝试点击屏幕左下角的<color="#61D8FFc0">“星球缩略图”</color>按钮，
或按<color="#61D8FFc0">[M]</color>键进入行星视图模式。
ENUS: You can now click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Planet thumbnail</color> button in the lower-left corner of the screen or press the <color="#61D8FFc0">[M]</color> key to try the planet view mode.
FRFR: Vous pouvez maintenant cliquer sur <color="#61D8FFc0">l'Icone de Planète</color> dans le coin inférieur gauche de l'écran ou appuyer sur la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[M]</color> pour entrer dans le mode Affichage de la Planète.

Name: 顾问字幕26
ZHCN: 现在，你可以尝试点击屏幕左下角的<color="#61D8FFc0">“星图（V）”</color>按钮进入星图模式，查看行星系甚至整个星区。
ENUS: Now, you can try the view of the whole planetary system and even the entire cluster by clicking the <color="#61D8FFc0">Starmap (V)</color> button in the lower-left corner of the screen.
FRFR: Maintenant, vous pouvez cliquer sur le bouton <color="#61D8FFc0">Starmap (V)</color> dans le coin inférieur gauche de l'écran pour entrer dans le mode Carte des Étoiles, et voir le système planétaire et même l'amas d’étoiles en entier.

Name: 顾问字幕27
ZHCN: 你解锁了宇宙探索，现在可以点击屏幕右下角的<color="#61D8FFc0">“详情显示（H）”</color>按钮来开启实时矿脉分布详情。
ENUS: You have unlocked the Universe Exploration. Now you can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Details display (H)</color> button in the lower-right corner of the screen to open real-time distribution details of the ore veins.
FRFR: Vous avez débloqué l'Exploration de l'Univers. Vous pouvez maintenant cliquer sur le bouton <color="#61D8FFc0">Affichage des Détails (H)</color> dans le coin inférieur droit de l'écran pour ouvrir les détails de la répartition des veines en temps réel.

Name: 顾问字幕28
ZHCN: 你建造了一个储物仓，它可以用来存放货物。你可以手动存放一些货物，也可以使用分拣器来自动存取货物。
ENUS: You built a Storage, which can be used to store cargo. You can manually store, or use the sorter to automatically stock the cargo.
FRFR: Vous construisez un Entrepôt, qui peut être utilisé pour stocker des cargaisons. Vous pouvez stocker manuellement ou utiliser la Trieuse pour stocker et retirer automatiquement les cargaisons.

Name: 顾问字幕29
ZHCN: 你建造了一个无线输电塔，这种输电塔感应距离更长，适合远距离电力传输。<color="#61D8FFc0">令人兴奋的是，它还可以使用电网的电力给机甲充电！</color>
ENUS: You built a Wireless Power Tower, which is suitable with long-distance power transmission caused by its longer connection distance. <color="#61D8FFc0">What's exciting is that it can also charge mecha by using electricity from the grid!</color>
FRFR: Vous construisez un pylône électrique sans fil, qui permet une plus grande distance de connexion et convient à la transmission d'électricité sur de longues distances. <color="#61D8FFc0">Ce qui est passionnant, c'est qu'il peut aussi utiliser l'électricité du réseau pour charger un Méca !</color>

Name: 顾问字幕30
ZHCN: 一个火力发电厂！这类发电设施需要消耗<color="#61D8FFc0">化学能燃料</color>，如果你想火力发电厂持续稳定地发电，就需要随时保证充足的燃料供应。
ENUS: A thermal power station! Such power facilities need to consume <color="#61D8FFc0">Chemical energy fuels</color>. If you want it to generate continuous and stable power, you need to ensure a sufficient fuel supply at all times.
FRFR: Une centrale thermique ! Ces centrales doivent consommer des <color="#61D8FFc0">combustibles chimiques</color>. Si vous voulez que la centrale thermique produise une énergie continue et stable, vous devez garantir un approvisionnement en combustible suffisant à tout moment.

Name: 顾问字幕31
ZHCN: 地基，一种地形平整工具。<color="#61D8FFc0">但我们并不能用它来随意改变星球的地貌，只能将地形平整至零海拔。</color>如果对高地使用地基，将会获得沙土；相反如果对海洋或低洼地区使用地基则必须消耗沙土。铺设地基时可以选择一种装饰，或者不带装饰，只平整地形。
ENUS: Foundation, a terrain leveling tool, <color="#61D8FFc0">yet we cannot use it to change the planetary landforms at will. We can only level the surface to ground zero.</color> If the foundation is used for high grounds, it will gain soil pile; on the contrary, if it is used on the ocean or low-lying areas, it must consume soil pile. When installing the foundation, either choose a kind of decoration, or without decoration, even only surface leveling.
FRFR: Fondations. Un outil de nivellement de surface, <color="#61D8FFc0">mais nous ne pouvons pas l'utiliser pour modifier à volonté les reliefs planétaires. Nous ne pouvons niveler la surface que jusqu'à l'altitude zéro.</color> Si vous utilisez la fondation pour un terrain élevé, vous obtiendrez des tas de terre ; au contraire, si vous utilisez la fondation pour l'océan ou les zones basses, vous devez utiliser des tas de terre. Lors de la pose des fondations, vous pouvez choisir un type de décoration, ou sans décoration. Nivelle uniquement la surface.

Name: 顾问字幕32
ZHCN: 数据显示，这个行星没有天然的硅石矿。不过，你还是可以通过冶炼石矿来获得一些。如果需要采集大量的硅石，就需要尽快寻找有硅石矿的行星。
ENUS: The data shows this is a planet without natural Silicon veins. However, you can still obtain some by smelting stone ore. While you need a massive silicon collection, you need to find a planet riched with Silicon veins ASAP.
FRFR: Les données montrent que cette planète n'a pas de veines naturelles de Silicium, mais on peut quand même en obtenir en fondant du minerai. Si vous avez besoin de collecter beaucoup de minerais de Silicium, vous devez trouver une planète avec des veines de Silicium le plus rapidement possible.

Name: 顾问字幕33
ZHCN: 数据显示，这个行星没有天然的钛石矿，采集碎石也许能够获得一些。但是如果需要大量的钛石，就需要尽快寻找有钛石矿的行星。
ENUS: The data shows this is a planet without natural Titanium veins, perhaps you can get some by collecting gravels. If you need a massive titanium collection, you need to find a planet riched with Titanium veins ASAP.
FRFR: Les données montrent que cette planète ne possède pas de veines naturelles de Titane. La collecte de graviers peut permettre d'en obtenir, mais si vous avez besoin de beaucoup de minerais de Titane, vous devez trouver une planète avec des veines de Titane le plus rapidement possible.

Name: 顾问字幕34
ZHCN: 你建造了一个分馏塔，它可以从液态氢中随机分馏出一些重氢。<color="#61D8FFc0">使用传送带将氢从一侧导入，经过分馏后，从另一侧导出，产出的重氢则从正面口导出。</color>如果想要提高重氢的产量，你可以提高货物的进出速度，或者建造更多的分馏塔。
ENUS: You built a Fractionator, which can randomly fractionate several deuterium out of liquid hydrogen. <color="#61D8FFc0">Use a conveyor belt to import hydrogen from one side, export from the opposite side, and the deuterium will export from the front port after fractional distillation.</color> You may want to increase the deuterium's production rate, you can accelerate the speed of materials in and out or build more fractionators.
FRFR: Vous avez construit un Fractionneur, qui peut extraire du deutérium à partir de l'hydrogène liquide. <color="#61D8FFc0">Utilisez un Tapis Roulant pour introduire l'hydrogène d'un côté, après la distillation fractionnée, l'exporter de l'autre côté, et exporter le deutérium par le port frontal.</color> Si vous voulez augmenter la production de deutérium, vous pouvez augmenter la vitesse d'entrée et de sortie des matériaux ou construire d'autres Fractionneurs.

Name: 顾问字幕35
ZHCN: 物流运输站！你迈出了建立行星内物流运输网络的第一步，只要将原料供应地的物流运输站设置为<color="#61D8FFc0">“供应”</color>，行星内任何地方的物流运输站如果有<color="#61D8FFc0">“需求”</color>的话，运输机就会自动运送货物。<color="#61D8FFc0">千万别忘记在物流运输站内放入运输机，供应方或需求方皆可，</color>运输机只会为它所属的运输站工作。
ENUS: Logistics Station! You have taken the first step to establish the planetary logistics transportation network. Provided the place of the logistics station of the raw material is set to <color="#61D8FFc0">Supply</color>, the logistic drones will transport cargo to else where with a <color="#61D8FFc0">Demand</color> on the planet automatically. <color="#61D8FFc0">Never forget to put the logistic drones in the logistics station, either the supply or the demand side,</color> the logistic drones will only work for the transportation station they belonging to.
FRFR: Station Logistique ! Vous avez fait le premier pas pour établir un réseau de transport logistique planétaire. Tant que la station logistique du lieu d'approvisionnement en matières premières est réglée sur <color="#61D8FFc0">Offre locale</color>, les drones logistiques transporteront automatiquement les cargaisons vers n'importe quel endroit où il y a une <color="#61D8FFc0">Demande locale</color> sur la planète. <color="#61D8FFc0">N'oubliez pas de placer les drones logistiques dans la station logistique, que ce soit du côté de l'offre ou de la demande,</color> les drones logistiques ne travailleront que pour la station de transport à laquelle ils appartiennent.

Name: 顾问字幕36
ZHCN: 你的生产基地已经达到了一定的规模！现在，你可以点击屏幕右下角的<color="#61D8FFc0">“分析面板（P）”</color>按钮来查看统计数据，包括每种物品的产出消耗、电力数据等，利用这些动态数据可以帮助你管理生产基地。
ENUS: Your production compound has reached a certain scale. Now, click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Statistics panel (P)</color> button at the bottom right corner of the screen to view statistics, it includes the output consumption of each item, electricity data, etc. Use these dynamic data can help you manage your production base.
FRFR: Votre base de production a atteint une certaine échelle. Vous pouvez maintenant cliquer sur le bouton <color="#61D8FFc0">Panneau de statistiques (P)</color> en bas à droite de l'écran pour consulter des statistiques, notamment la consommation de production de chaque article, les données sur l'électricité, etc. L'utilisation de ces données dynamiques peut vous aider à gérer votre base de production.

Name: 顾问字幕37
ZHCN: 你建立了一座星际物流运输站，开启了群星之间物流交通的第一个节点！有了它，群星之间的货物运输再也不用手动搬运了。只要将原料供应行星上的站点设置为<color="#61D8FFc0">“星际供应”</color>，运输船就会自动将货物运送到其他行星上设有相应<color="#61D8FFc0">“星际需求”</color>的站点。同时，设置本地供应和需求也可以继承普通物流运输站的功能。
ENUS: You have established an interstellar logistics station and open the first node of logistics transportation among the planets. With it, no need to transport cargo between planets manually anymore. Just set to <color="#61D8FFc0">Remote supply</color> in the site on the raw material supply planet, the logistic vessels will bring the cargo to other planets with corresponding <color="#61D8FFc0">Remote demand</color> sites accordingly. Setting local supply and demand can also inherit the functions of ordinary logistics stations at the same time.
FRFR: Vous avez créé une Station Logistique Interstellaire et ouvert le premier nœud de transport logistique entre les planètes. Grâce à elle, le transport des cargaisons entre les planètes ne doit plus être effectué manuellement. Il suffit de régler le site de la planète d'approvisionnement en matières premières sur <color="#61D8FFc0">Offre à distance</color>, les navires logistiques transporteront automatiquement les cargaisons vers d'autres planètes ayant des sites de <color="#61D8FFc0">Demande à distance</color> correspondants. Le réglage de l'offre et de la demande locales peut également hériter des fonctions des stations logistiques ordinaires.

Name: 顾问字幕38
ZHCN: 你建造了一座强大的能量枢纽，利用它可以将电网内富余的电力快速充满蓄电器；也可以将储存在满蓄电器内的电能快速释放出来。只要保证稳定的物流，就可以持续地为电网供电。
ENUS: You have built a powerful energy exchanger and can use it to quickly fill the accumulator with the surplus electricity in the grid; you can also release the electric energy stored in the full accumulator with the same speed. With a stable logistics guarantee, it can continuously supply the grid with power.
FRFR: Vous avez construit un puissant Échangeur d'Énergie et vous pouvez l'utiliser pour remplir rapidement l'excédent d'électricité du réseau vers l’Accumulateur. Vous pouvez également libérer rapidement l'énergie électrique stockée dans l'Accumulateur plein. Assure seulement la logistique stable. Peut alimenter le réseau en continu.

Name: 顾问字幕39
ZHCN: 你建立了一座轨道采集器，它可以自动采集这颗巨星的资源。只要在其他站点将这些资源设置为<color="#61D8FFc0">“星际需求”</color>，该站点的运输船便会自动前来取货。另外，产出的资源将会优先转化为维持采集器工作所需的能量。
ENUS: You have built an orbital collector, which can collect the resources of this Gas Giant automatically. The logistics vessels will come to pick up the cargo as long as you set these resources as <color="#61D8FFc0">Interstellar demand</color> at other sites.Furthermore, to maintain the collector working, the collected resources will be transfer to energy in the first place.
FRFR: Vous avez construit un Collecteur Orbital, qui peut automatiquement collecter les ressources d’une Géante Gazeuse. Il suffit de définir ces ressources comme <color="#61D8FFc0">Demande à distance</color> sur d'autres sites, les navires logistiques de ces sites viendront automatiquement chercher les cargaisons. De plus, les ressources collectées seront prioritairement utilisées pour l'énergie nécessaire au fonctionnement du Collecteur.

Name: 顾问字幕40
ZHCN: 稀有矿物分布在不同的星球。如果找到这些稀有矿物，采集它们，并将它们投入到工业生产中，将会大大提高生产效率。
ENUS: Rare veins scatter around different planets. They will greatly improve production efficiency, so if you find them, collect them and put them as a part of industrial production.
FRFR: Les Veines Rares se répartissent sur différentes planètes. Si vous trouvez ces Veines Rares, collectez-les et mettez-les en production industrielle, vous améliorerez grandement l'efficacité de la production.

Name: 顾问字幕41
ZHCN: 一座电磁轨道弹射器！你迈出了建造戴森球的第一步，现在可以使用它来将太阳帆送入太空形成戴森云了。<color="#61D8FFc0">每个电磁轨道弹射器都需要设置轨道以及供应太阳帆，</color>你也可以通过复制粘贴的操作来完成轨道设置。如果你想要更多样化的戴森云轨道，可以点击屏幕左下角的<color="#61D8FFc0">“戴森球（Y）”</color>按钮打开戴森球面板，在这里你可以随心所欲的制定戴森云轨道。
ENUS: An EM-Rail Ejector! You have taken the first step to build the Dyson Sphere. Now you can use it to send Solar Sails into space for forming the Dyson swarm. <color="#61D8FFc0">Each EM-Rail Ejector requires to set up orbit and supply with Solar Sails.</color> Also, you can use copy and paste to set orbits. If you want a Dyson swarm orbit become more diversified, you can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Dyson sphere (Y)</color> button in the lower-left corner of the screen to open the Dyson Sphere panel, make your customization however you want.
FRFR: Un Rail d'Éjection Electro Magnétique ! Vous avez fait le premier pas pour construire la Sphère de Dyson. Vous pouvez maintenant l'utiliser pour envoyer des Voiles Solaires dans l'espace afin de former l'Essaim de Dyson. <color="#61D8FFc0">Chaque Rail d’Éjection EM doit se mettre en orbite et alimenter les Voiles Solaires.</color> Vous pouvez également utiliser le copier-coller pour définir l'orbite. Si vous souhaitez une orbite d'Essaim Dyson plus diversifiée, vous pouvez cliquer sur le bouton <color="#61D8FFc0">Sphère de Dyson (Y)</color> dans le coin inférieur gauche de l'écran pour ouvrir le panneau de la Sphère de Dyson, où vous pouvez personnaliser l'orbite de l'Essaim de Dyson comme vous le souhaitez.

Name: 顾问字幕42
ZHCN: 你的太阳帆数量达到了一定的规模，它们环绕着这颗恒星形成了一个戴森云。现在，应该能够清楚的看到它了。戴森云可以持续不断的产生电力，想要获取这些能量，你需要建造<color="#61D8FFc0">射线接收站</color>来进行接收。发射的每一个太阳帆都有一定的寿命周期，想要维持戴森云的电力输出，你就必须持续不断的发射太阳帆。
ENUS: The amount of your Solar Sails has reached a certain scale, and they have formed a Dyson Swarm around the star. You should be able to clearly see it right now. To receive such energy, you have to build <color="#61D8FFc0">a Ray Receiver</color> to absorb the transmission, where Dyson Swarm can generate power simultaneously. Every Solar Sail launched for a certain life cycle, if you want to maintain the Dyson Swarm, you have to continue on ejecting the Solar Sails.
FRFR: Le nombre de vos Voiles Solaires a atteint une certaine échelle, et elles ont formé un Essaim de Dyson autour de l'étoile. Vous devriez être en mesure de le voir clairement maintenant. L'Essaim de Dyson peut produire de l'électricité en continu. Pour obtenir cette énergie, vous devez construire <color="#61D8FFc0">un Récepteur de Rayons</color>. Chaque Voile Solaire lancée a un certain cycle de vie. Pour maintenir la production d'énergie de l'Essaim de Dyson, vous devez lancer les Voiles Solaires en continu.

Name: 顾问字幕43
ZHCN: 你建造了一个射线接收站，它可以接收从戴森球上传输回来的高能射线，并直接输入到电网。不过因为射线接收效率的缘故，射线接收站向戴森球请求的功率会大于额定输出功率，<color="#61D8FFc0">你可以通过让它持续工作或者升级科技来提高射线的接收效率。</color>
ENUS: You built a ray receiver, which can receive the high-energy rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere and directly input them to the power grid. However, caused by the ray receiving efficiency, the ray receiver's requested power will be larger than the documented output power of the Dyson sphere. <color="#61D8FFc0">You can keep it working or upgrade technologies to increase the ray receiving efficiency.</color>
FRFR: Vous construisez un Récepteur de Rayons, qui peut recevoir les rayons à haute énergie émis par la Sphère de Dyson et les injecter directement dans le réseau électrique. Cependant, la puissance demandée par le Récepteur de Rayons à la Sphère de Dyson sera supérieure à la puissance de sortie nominale en raison de l'efficacité de réception des rayons. <color="#61D8FFc0">Vous pouvez augmenter l'efficacité de la réception des rayons en la maintenant en fonctionnement ou en améliorant la technologie.</color>

Name: 顾问字幕44
ZHCN: 你建立了一座垂直发射井，现在可以使用它来建造戴森球的主要结构了。<color="#61D8FFc0">不过在这之前，你需要进入戴森球面板规划戴森球节点及框架。</color>规划完成后，垂直发射井将会自动发射<color="#61D8FFc0">装载有戴森球组件的小型运载火箭</color>来建造戴森球节点和框架，每支火箭提供一个结构点数。在发射井的面板中，你可以查看戴森球所需的结构点数。
ENUS: You have built a Vertical Launching Silo, now you can use it to construct the main structure of the Dyson sphere. <color="#61D8FFc0">But before that, you need to enter the Dyson sphere panel to finish planning the Dyson sphere nodes and frames.</color> After the plan is completed, the Vertical Launching Silo will automatically launch <color="#61D8FFc0">Small carrier rockets loaded with Dyson sphere components</color> to build the nodes and frames. Each rocket provides one structure point, and you can use the Vertical Launching Silo panel to master the required structure points.
FRFR: Vous avez construit un Silo de Lancement Vertical, et vous pouvez maintenant l'utiliser pour construire la structure principale de la Sphère de Dyson. <color="#61D8FFc0">Mais avant cela, vous devez entrer dans le Panneau de la Sphère de Dyson pour planifier les Nœuds et les Cadres de la Sphère de Dyson.</color> Après avoir fait un plan, le Silo de Lancement Vertical lancera automatiquement des <color="#61D8FFc0">Petites Fusées Porteuses chargées de composants pour la Sphère de Dyson</color> afin de construire les Nœuds et les Cadres. Chaque fusée fournit un point de structure, et vous pouvez voir les points de structure requis pour la Sphère de Dyson dans le Panneau du Silo de Lancement Vertical.

Name: 顾问字幕45
ZHCN: 你规划了一个戴森壳，一旦戴森壳上的节点和框架建造完成后，<color="#61D8FFc0">将会自动吸收太阳帆形成戴森壳。</color>每个太阳帆提供一个细胞点数，可以点击壳面来查看这个壳面所需的细胞点数。
ENUS: You have finished a Dyson shell planning. Once nodes and frames are done construction, <color="#61D8FFc0">the Dyson shell will put Solar Sails to use automatically.</color> Each Solar Sails provides one cell point, and you can click the shell to view the total number of cell points required.
FRFR: Vous avez prévu une Coque de Dyson. Une fois les Nœuds et les Cadres construits, <color="#61D8FFc0">la Coque de Dyson absorbera automatiquement les Voiles Solaires.</color> Chaque Voile Solaire fournit un point de cellule, et vous pouvez cliquer sur la Coque pour voir le nombre de points de cellule requis.

Name: 顾问字幕46
ZHCN: 四向分流器，它可以对通过的货物进行分流，或者均衡多条传送带上的货物。分流速度取决于传送带的速度，使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[TAB]</color>键可以切换不同的样式，点击分流器可以设置优先级和过滤器。
ENUS: Splitter (with 4-directions)! It can split the passing cargo or balance the cargo on multiple conveyor belts, the splitting speed depends on the conveyor belt's speed. Use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[TAB]</color> key to switch between different styles, and click it to set priorities and filters.
FRFR: Répartiteur (4 directions), il peut répartir les cargaisons qui passent ou équilibrer les cargaisons sur plusieurs Tapis Roulants, et la vitesse de répartition dépend de la vitesse du Tapis Roulant. Utilisez la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[TAB]</color> pour passer d'un style à l'autre, et cliquez sur le Répartiteur pour définir les priorités et les filtres.

Name: 顾问字幕47
ZHCN: 当超出建筑范围时，可以按住<color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color>键，使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[鼠标右键]</color>点击空地操控机甲移动。
ENUS: When being outside of building range, you can hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key and use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right mouse button]</color> to click on the open space to control the mecha to move.
FRFR: Lorsque vous êtes hors de portée de bâtiment, vous pouvez contrôler le mouvement du Méca en maintenant la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> enfoncée et en utilisant le <color="#61D8FFc0">[bouton droit de la souris]</color> pour cliquer sur l'espace ouvert.

Name: 顾问字幕48
ZHCN: 你获得了飞行能力！双击<color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color>键升空，然后使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[方向键]</color>控制机甲移动。在飞行模式下，移动速度将会提高<color="#61D8FFc0">150%</color>，消耗的能量也更多，在飞行过程中按<color="#61D8FFc0">[ALT]</color>键可以让机甲返回陆地。
ENUS: You have received the ability to fly, double-click the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color> key to lift off, and then use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Direction keys]</color> to control mecha movement. The moving speed will increase by <color="#61D8FFc0">150%</color> with more energy consumed under Flight Mode. Pressing the <color="#61D8FFc0">[ALT]</color> key can return the mecha to the ground during the flight.
FRFR: Vous avez obtenu le mode Vol. Appuyez deux fois sur la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[Espace]</color> pour décoller, puis utilisez les <color="#61D8FFc0">[flèches]</color> pour contrôler le mouvement du Méca. La vitesse de déplacement augmentera de <color="#61D8FFc0">150%</color> et consommera plus d'énergie en mode vol. En appuyant sur la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[ALT]</color> pendant le vol, le Méca peut revenir se poser.

Name: 顾问字幕49
ZHCN: 你获得了航行能力！双击<color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color>键升空进入飞行模式。在飞行模式下持续按住<color="#61D8FFc0">[前进方向]</color>与<color="#61D8FFc0">[空格]</color>键，达到一定高度时将会进入航行模式。
ENUS: You have received the ability to Sail, double-click the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color> key to lift off to enter the Flight Mode, and keep pressing the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Forward direction]</color> and <color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color> keys in the Flight Mode, and you will enter the Sailing Mode when you reach a certain altitude.
FRFR: Vous avez obtenu le mode Navigation. Appuyez deux fois sur la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[Espace]</color> pour décoller et continuez à appuyer sur la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[flèche avant]</color> et <color="#61D8FFc0">[Espace]</color> en mode vol. Vous entrerez en mode Navigation lorsque vous atteindrez une certaine altitude.

Name: 顾问字幕50
ZHCN: 在航行模式下，你可以跟随<color="#61D8FFc0">太空导航中的箭头标识方向</color>控制机甲前往不同的行星或星系。按住<color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color>键加速，<color="#61D8FFc0">[后方向键]</color>减速，还可以使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[Q]/[R]</color>键或按住<color="#61D8FFc0">[鼠标右键]</color>拖动进行侧飞。
ENUS: In Sailing Mode, you can control the mecha go to different planets or planetary systems by following <color="#61D8FFc0">the arrows in the Space Navigation,</color> hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key to accelerate, <color="#61D8FFc0">[Backward key]</color> to slow down. You can also use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Q]/[R]</color> keys or hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right Mouse button]</color> dragging to sideward flight.
FRFR: En mode Navigation, vous pouvez contrôler le Méca vers différentes planètes ou systèmes planétaires en suivant <color="#61D8FFc0">les flèches de la navigation spatiale,</color> en maintenant la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> enfoncée pour accélérer, <color="#61D8FFc0">[flèche arrière]</color> pour ralentir. Vous pouvez également utiliser les touches <color="#61D8FFc0">[Q] [R]</color> ou maintenir enfoncé le <color="#61D8FFc0">[Bouton droit de la souris]</color> pour vous déplacer latéralement.

Name: 顾问字幕51
ZHCN: 你获得了曲速飞行的能力！当脱离行星引力范围后，可以使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[CAPSLOCK]</color>开启曲速飞行。<color="#61D8FFc0">每次开启曲速除了会消耗大量的能量之外，还将会额外消耗1个空间翘曲器。</color>如果想要自由的穿梭星际，你需要准备充足的能量和空间翘曲器。
ENUS: You have reached the ability to warp. When you are out of the planetary gravitational range, you can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[CAPSLOCK]</color> key to turn on the warp. Each time you turn it on, <color="#61D8FFc0">it will consume a great amount of energy and an additional Space Warper.</color> If you want to travel freely between the stars, you need to prepare sufficient energy and Space Warpers.
FRFR: Vous avez obtenu le mode Distorsion. Lorsque vous êtes en dehors du champ gravitationnel planétaire, vous pouvez utiliser la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[CapsLock]</color> pour activer la Distorsion. Chaque fois que vous activerez la Distorsion, <color="#61D8FFc0">elle consommera beaucoup d'énergie et une unité de Distorsion Spatiale supplémentaire.</color> Si vous voulez voyager librement entre les étoiles, vous devez préparer suffisamment d'énergie et de Distorsion Spatiale.

Name: 顾问字幕52
ZHCN: 你解锁了垂直建造科技。在搭建矩阵研究站、储物仓和储液罐等建筑时，可以尝试在垂直方向往上搭建，这样可以更有效地利用空间。
ENUS: You have unlocked the Vertical construction technology. When building facilities such as Matrix Lab, Storage, and Storage Tank, you can try to build them vertically to make more efficient use of space.
FRFR: Vous avez débloqué la technologie de Construction Verticale. Lorsque vous construisez des installations telles qu'un Labo de Matrice, un Entrepôt et un Réservoir de Stockage, vous pouvez essayer de les construire verticalement afin d'utiliser l'espace de manière plus efficace.

Name: 顾问字幕53
ZHCN: 你解锁了运输船引擎等级4。现在星际物流运输船可以曲速飞行了，<color="#61D8FFc0">不过星际物流运输船使用曲速飞行来回运送一次货物将会消耗2个空间翘曲器，</color>因此需要随时保证星际物流运输站内有充足的空间翘曲器。
ENUS: You have unlocked the Logistics carrier engine Level 4. It allows the logistic vessels to warp, <color="#61D8FFc0">but they will consume two Space Warpers back and forth to transport cargo,</color> so needs to make sure there are enough Space Warpers in the Interstellar Logistics Station at any time.
FRFR: Vous avez débloqué le moteur du Transporteur Logistique de niveau 4. Maintenant, les Vaisseaux Logistiques peuvent utiliser la Distorsion. <color="#61D8FFc0">Mais un Vaisseau Logistique qui utilise la Distorsion pour transporter des cargaisons dans les deux sens consommera 2 unités de Distorsion Spatiale supplémentaires.</color> Il faut donc s'assurer qu'il y a suffisamment d'unités de Distorsion Spatiale dans la station logistique interstellaire à tout moment.

Name: 顾问字幕54
ZHCN: 你拆除了戴森球的结构，这个操作将会散落出太阳帆。虽然这会短暂地提高戴森球的总发电量，<color="#61D8FFc0">但是散落的太阳帆会有一定的寿命周期。</color>
ENUS: You demolish the structure of the Dyson sphere, it will scatter the Solar Sails, and this will temporarily increase the total power generation of the Dyson sphere, <color="#61D8FFc0">but these scattered Solar Sails will regain their life cycle.</color>
FRFR: Vous avez supprimé la structure de la Sphère de Dyson. Cette opération va disperser les Voiles Solaires et augmenter temporairement la production totale d'énergie de la Sphère de Dyson. <color="#61D8FFc0">Mais ces Voiles Solaires dispersées auront un cycle de vie limité.</color>

Name: 顾问字幕55
ZHCN:
<color="#61D8FFc0">恭喜你！伟大文明的建设者！</color>戴森球计划的主要任务在你的努力下顺利完成了。
你所提供的能量势必会让家园快速发展，这里每一步的前进都将印刻着你的身影。
这个星区已经被激活，人们点亮银河系视图中的一颗星来铭记你的功绩。
没错，它将永远的记录你为即将诞生的三级文明作出的贡献。
现在请稍作休息吧，然后再次踏上星辰大海的征途。
ENUS: <color="#61D8FFc0">Congratulations! Builder of great civilizations!</color> The primary mission of the Dyson Sphere Program has been successfully complete with your efforts. The energy you provide is bound to make the homeland develop with high speed, and your figure will imprint with every step forward. This cluster has been activated, to remember your achievements, people light up a star in the Milky Way Starmap. Yes, it will always record your contribution to the forthcoming Third-level civilization. Now please rest a while, and then embark on the journey of the sea of stars again.
FRFR:
<color="#61D8FFc0">Félicitations! Bâtisseurs de grandes civilisations!</color> Les principales tâches du Programme Sphère de Dyson ont été accomplies avec succès grâce à vos efforts.
L'énergie que vous fournissez est destinée à faire évoluer rapidement le pays et chaque pas en avant laissera votre marque ici.
Cet amas a été activé, et les gens allument désormais une étoile dans la Voie lactée en souvenir de vos réalisations. Oui, elle témoignera toujours de votre contribution à la future civilisation de troisième niveau.
Maintenant prenez un repos bien mérité, avant d'embarquer à nouveau pour un voyage sur la mer d'étoiles...

Name: 顾问字幕56
ZHCN: 设置好配方后，可以使用<color="#61D8FFc0">[＜]</color>键来复制当前建筑的配方，<color="#61D8FFc0">[＞]</color>键将该配方粘贴给下一个需要设置相同配方的建筑。
ENUS: After selecting the recipe, you can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＜]</color> key to copy the recipe and the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＞]</color> key to paste to the next building that needs to set the same recipe.
FRFR: Après avoir sélectionné le Plan de Production, vous pouvez utiliser la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[＜]</color> pour copier le Plan et la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[＞]</color> pour le coller dans une autre usine.

Name: 顾问字幕57
ZHCN: 在行星视图模式下，你可以按住<color="#61D8FFc0">[鼠标中键]</color>拖动，旋转视角，按住<color="#61D8FFc0">[鼠标右键]</color>拖动，翻滚视角，按<color="#61D8FFc0">[N]</color>键则可以将前方对准北极。
ENUS: In the planet view mode, you can hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Middle Mouse Button]</color> drag, rotate the angle of view, and hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right Mouse Button]</color> drag to roll the angle of view, press <color="#61D8FFc0">[N]</color> key to point to the front to the north pole.
FRFR: En mode Affichage de la Planète, vous pouvez maintenir enfoncé la <color="#61D8FFc0">[Molette de la souris]</color>, faire pivoter l'angle de vue, et maintenir enfoncé le <color="#61D8FFc0">[Bouton droit de la souris]</color> pour faire tourner l'angle de vue. Appuyer sur la touche <color="#61D8FFc0">[N]</color> pour pointer vers le Pôle Nord.

Name: 顾问字幕58
ZHCN: 在行星视图模式下滑动<color="#61D8FFc0">[鼠标滚轮]</color>也可以进入星图模式。
ENUS: In the planet view mode, slide the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Mouse Wheel]</color> to enter the Starmap Mode.
FRFR: En mode d'Affichage des Planètes, faites rouler la <color="#61D8FFc0">[Molette de la souris]</color> pour passer en mode Carte des Étoiles.

Name: 前情介绍前字
ZHCN:
在未来，人类踏入高级文明的行列，科技的强大带来了飞速的发展。人们利用虚拟现实迭代了空间与时间，创造了一个比真实世界大得多的虚拟宇宙，并逐渐把人的意识转移到虚拟宇宙里。


虚拟世界的运行需要强大的计算能力。为此，人类环绕太阳，创造了超级计算机━━“主脑”，以期待利用其强大的计算能力来进一步扩大虚拟家园。随着意识数量的不断增长，主脑的计算能力也逐渐达到极限。如果想要容纳更多的意识，就需要更多的能量供应。为此，空间管理联盟开启了代号为“戴森球计划”的工程项目，派遣工程师前往真实世界建造戴森球，为“主脑”提供持续稳定的能量。作为空间管理联盟的一员、戴森球计划的先驱，你将利用终端控制机甲踏上未知的征程，从一无所有白手起家，采集资源，规划设计生产线，逐步实现全自动化，将你的工厂从一个小作坊，发展成为庞大的跨星系工业帝国，最终构建伟大的奇迹━━戴森球。


伟大文明的建设者！在这一过程中，你势必会遭遇许多困难，毕竟宇宙之大，什么都可能发生。然而，你的创造力与想象力将会助你完成这一伟大的目标，整个银河势必将在你的规划下成为人类文明前进的基石。
ENUS:
In the future, human beings enter the ranks of advanced civilizations, and the power of science and technology brings rapid development. People use virtual reality to iterate space and time, create a virtual universe much larger than the real world, and gradually transfer human consciousness to the virtual universe.


The operation of the virtual world requires supercomputing power. For this reason, human beings circle the sun and create a supercomputer, the CentreBrain, hoping to use its powerful computing power to expand the virtual home. The computing power of the CentreBrain gradually reaches its limit because the number of consciousness continues to grow. If want to accommodate more consciousness, it needs more energy supply. So, the COSMO launched an engineering project code-named Dyson Sphere Program, sending engineers to the real world to build the Dyson sphere to provide continuous and stable energy for the CentreBrain. As a member of COSMO and the pioneer of the Dyson Sphere Program, you will control the mecha on an unknown journey by using the terminal. You need gather resources, plan and design production lines, gradually realize full automation, starting from scratch. And transform your factory from a small workshop, developing into a magnificent inter-galactic industrial empire, and finally built a great miracle, the Dyson Sphere.


Builders of great civilizations! In this process, you are bound to encounter many difficulties. After all, the universe is so large that anything can happen. However, your creativity and imagination will help you accomplish this great goal. The entire cluster will become the cornerstone of human civilization under your plan.
FRFR:
In the future, human beings enter the ranks of advanced civilizations, and the power of science and technology brings rapid development. People use virtual reality to iterate space and time, create a virtual universe much larger than the real world, and gradually transfer human consciousness to the virtual universe.


The operation of the virtual world requires supercomputing power. For this reason, human beings circle the sun and create a supercomputer, the CentreBrain, hoping to use its powerful computing power to expand the virtual home. The computing power of the CentreBrain gradually reaches its limit because the number of consciousness continues to grow. If want to accommodate more consciousness, it needs more energy supply. So, the COSMO launched an engineering project code-named Dyson Sphere Program, sending engineers to the real world to build the Dyson sphere to provide continuous and stable energy for the CentreBrain. As a member of COSMO and the pioneer of the Dyson Sphere Program, you will control the mecha on an unknown journey by using the terminal. You need gather resources, plan and design production lines, gradually realize full automation, starting from scratch. And transform your factory from a small workshop, developing into a magnificent inter-galactic industrial empire, and finally built a great miracle, the Dyson Sphere.


Builders of great civilizations! In this process, you are bound to encounter many difficulties. After all, the universe is so large that anything can happen. However, your creativity and imagination will help you accomplish this great goal. The entire cluster will become the cornerstone of human civilization under your plan.

Name: 戴森球介绍前字
ZHCN:
在浩瀚的宇宙中，一个文明随着它的不断发展，对能源的需求也会不断的增加。当行星上的能源无法再继续维持整个文明发展时，开发恒星的能量便成为文明发展的必然选择。


1960年，弗里曼·戴森先生提出一个传奇式的构想━━“戴森球”理论。<color="#FD965ECC">它是一种设想中的太空巨构，能够包围整个恒星，并且获得其绝大多数或全部的能量输出。</color>
ENUS:
As civilization continues to develop, the demand for energy will continue to increase in the vast universe. Develop the star's energy becomes an inevitable choice for civilization's development when the energy on the planet can no longer sustain.


In 1960, Mr. Freeman Dyson put forward a legendary concept, the Dyson Sphere theory. <color="#FD965ECC">Dyson Sphere is an imaginary space giant that can surround the entire star and obtain most or all of its energy output.</color>
FRFR:
As civilization continues to develop, the demand for energy will continue to increase in the vast universe. Develop the star's energy becomes an inevitable choice for civilization's development when the energy on the planet can no longer sustain.


In 1960, Mr. Freeman Dyson put forward a legendary concept, the Dyson Sphere theory. <color="#FD965ECC">Dyson Sphere is an imaginary space giant that can surround the entire star and obtain most or all of its energy output.</color>

Name: 戴森球介绍后字
ZHCN:
根据卡尔达舍夫文明等级的划分：
I 类文明，能够开发利用自己栖息的那颗行星的所有资源；
II 类文明，能够收集整个恒星系统的能量，甚至可以让物质突破光速限制；
III 类文明，能够掌握并利用整个银河系的全部能源。


<color="#FD965ECC">拥有建造戴森球的能力，标志着人类将迈向 II 类文明。</color>

Name: 采集资源指令前字
ZHCN:
使用 <color="#FD965ECC">[鼠标右键]</color> 点击地面目标，可以命令机甲前往该目标，若目标为资源时，则可命令机甲前往采集。


另外，为了更方便的操作，<color="#FD965ECC">按住[SHIFT]+[鼠标右键]</color>可以下达一连串的指令，比如连续伐树，或者伐树后移动至目标。
ENUS:
You can use <color="#FD965ECC">[Right mouse button]</color> to click on a ground target to command mecha to there. If the target is a resource, you can order the mecha to gather.


Also, for more convenient operation, <color="#FD965ECC">hold down [SHIFT] + [Right mouse button]</color> to give a series of commands, such as continuously felling trees or moving to the target after felling.
FRFR:
You can use <color="#FD965ECC">[Right mouse button]</color> to click on a ground target to command mecha to there. If the target is a resource, you can order the mecha to gather.


Also, for more convenient operation, <color="#FD965ECC">hold down [SHIFT] + [Right mouse button]</color> to give a series of commands, such as continuously felling trees or moving to the target after felling.

Name: 采矿机搭建及矿脉覆盖标题
ZHCN: 采矿机搭建及矿脉覆盖
ENUS: Build Mining Machine and Veins Coverage
FRFR: Build Mining Machine and Veins Coverage

Name: 采矿机搭建及矿脉覆盖前字
ZHCN:
采矿机可以自动采集矿物，使用 <color="#FD965ECC">[R]</color> 键可以旋转采矿机使其扇形区域覆盖矿脉，每次旋转<color="#FD965ECC">90°</color>。
按住<color="#FD965ECC">[SHIFT]</color>可以忽略建造网格的吸附，此时可以更细微的调整采矿机的位置及旋转，以覆盖更多的矿脉。
ENUS:
The mining machine can automatically gather ores. Use the <color="#FD965ECC">[R]</color> key to rotate the mining machine so that its fan-shaped area covers the veins, rotating <color="#FD965ECC">90°</color> each time.
Press and hold <color="#FD965ECC">[SHIFT]</color> to ignore the snapping to the construction grid. At this time, you can more finely adjust the position and rotation of the mining machine to cover more veins.
FRFR:
The mining machine can automatically gather ores. Use the <color="#FD965ECC">[R]</color> key to rotate the mining machine so that its fan-shaped area covers the veins, rotating <color="#FD965ECC">90°</color> each time.
Press and hold <color="#FD965ECC">[SHIFT]</color> to ignore the snapping to the construction grid. At this time, you can more finely adjust the position and rotation of the mining machine to cover more veins.

Name: 采矿机搭建及矿脉覆盖后字
ZHCN:
采矿机覆盖的矿脉数量越多，采集矿物的速度就越快，覆盖的每个矿脉提供<color="#FD965ECC">30/min</color>的基础产能。采矿作业将轮流消耗所覆盖的矿脉，这使得每个矿脉的消耗速度一致。当采矿机覆盖的其中一个矿脉枯竭后，采矿机的产能将下降。


矿脉覆盖并不是越多越好，很多时候需要考虑产出与消耗的平衡来决定覆盖几个矿脉。


单个矿脉可以被多个采矿机覆盖，覆盖它的采矿机越多，消耗速度越快。


如果想要提高采矿机的采矿速度以及降低采矿作业对矿脉的损耗，可以不断升级<color="#FD965ECC">“科技树(T)”</color>━━<color="#FD965ECC">“升级”</color>版块中的<color="#FD965ECC">“矿物利用”</color>科技。
ENUS:
The more veins covered by the mining machine, the gathering speed is faster. Each covered vein provides a basic capacity of <color="#FD965ECC">30/min</color>. The consumption rate of each vein is consistent because the Mining machine consumes the covered veins in turn. When one of the covered veins is exhausted, the production capacity of the mining machine will decrease.


Veins coverage is not the more the better. In many cases, it is necessary to determine the number of veins covered according to the balance of output and consumption.


A single vein can be covered by multiple mining machines. The more mining machines covering it, the consumption rate is faster.


By continuously upgrade the <color="#FD965ECC">Mineral Utilization Technology</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Technology Tree (T), Upgrade section,</color> you can increase the mining speed of mining machines and reduce the loss of veins caused by mining operations.
FRFR:
The more veins covered by the mining machine, the gathering speed is faster. Each covered vein provides a basic capacity of <color="#FD965ECC">30/min</color>. The consumption rate of each vein is consistent because the Mining machine consumes the covered veins in turn. When one of the covered veins is exhausted, the production capacity of the mining machine will decrease.


Veins coverage is not the more the better. In many cases, it is necessary to determine the number of veins covered according to the balance of output and consumption.


A single vein can be covered by multiple mining machines. The more mining machines covering it, the consumption rate is faster.


By continuously upgrade the <color="#FD965ECC">Mineral Utilization Technology</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Technology Tree (T), Upgrade section,</color> you can increase the mining speed of mining machines and reduce the loss of veins caused by mining operations.

Name: 电网建立指南前字
ZHCN:
要想让生产设施运行，需要将它接入电网，并且电网内要有发电设施提供电力。


电网中的设施分为<color="#FD965ECC">“发电设施”</color>、<color="#FD965ECC">“用电设施”</color>、<color="#FD965ECC">“蓄电设施”</color>以及<color="#FD965ECC">“输电设施”</color>。


若一个电网中的发电功率＞用电功率，用电设施满负荷运转，剩余的电能将以一定功率存入蓄电设施；
若一个电网中的发电功率＜用电功率，蓄电设施将优先以一定功率放电以填补电力缺口。若所有蓄电器以最大功率放电后，仍无法填补电力缺口，用电设施将因为电力不足而减缓其工作速度。
<color="#FD965ECC">一旦电网中的供电率＜10%，电网将会跳闸，生产设施停止运转。</color>
ENUS:
For production facilities to work, they need to connect to the grid, and there must be power generation facilities in the grid to provide electricity.


There are <color="#FD965ECC">power generation facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power consumption facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power storage facilities</color>, and <color="#FD965ECC">power transmission facilities</color> in the power grid.


If the power generation of the power grid is greater than power consumption, the power consumption facilities will run at full load. And the accumulators will store the surplus electricity with a certain power.
If the power generation of the power grid is less than power consumption, the accumulators will firstly discharge with a certain power to fill the power gap. If still not to fill the power gap after all accumulators automatically discharging at the max power, the power consumption facilities will slow down work speed due to insufficient power.
<color="#FD965ECC">Once the satisfaction of the power grid is less than 10%, the power grid will trip. At the same time, the production facilities will stop working.</color>
FRFR:
For production facilities to work, they need to connect to the grid, and there must be power generation facilities in the grid to provide electricity.


There are <color="#FD965ECC">power generation facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power consumption facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power storage facilities</color>, and <color="#FD965ECC">power transmission facilities</color> in the power grid.


If the power generation of the power grid is greater than power consumption, the power consumption facilities will run at full load. And the accumulators will store the surplus electricity with a certain power.
If the power generation of the power grid is less than power consumption, the accumulators will firstly discharge with a certain power to fill the power gap. If still not to fill the power gap after all accumulators automatically discharging at the max power, the power consumption facilities will slow down work speed due to insufficient power.
<color="#FD965ECC">Once the satisfaction of the power grid is less than 10%, the power grid will trip. At the same time, the production facilities will stop working.</color>

Name: 电网建立指南后字
ZHCN:
前期可以利用风力涡轮机来产生电力。风力涡轮机利用风力发电，不需要消耗燃料，是前期发展非常实用的发电设施。另外，不同行星的风能利用率各不相同。


风力涡轮机自带一定的电力覆盖区域，不过这个区域很小。如果想要扩展电力的供应范围，<color="#FD965ECC">需要使用电力感应塔来进行输电及覆盖。</color>不同的输电设施具有不同的连接长度和覆盖范围，升级科技可以解锁更高级的输电设施。


需要燃料的发电设施将根据实际用电功率来消耗燃料。


你可以点击电力感应塔来查看当前电网的电力信息，根究耗电需求随时进行调整。
打开<color="#FD965ECC">“详情显示(H)”</color>中的<color="#FD965ECC">“电力网络”</color>可以让电力网络常显。
ENUS:
In the early stage, you can use Wind turbines to generate electricity. Wind turbines use wind power to generate electricity and do not need to consume fuels. It is a very practical power generation facility for early development. Besides, different planets have different wind energy ratio.


Wind turbines come with a power supply area, but this area is very small. If you want to expand the power grid's supply range, <color="#FD965ECC">you need to use the Tesla tower to transmit and supply power.</color> Different power transmission facilities have different connection lengths and supply areas. You can unlock more advanced power transmission facilities by upgrading Technology.


Power generation facilities that require fuels will consume fuels based on the actual consumption power.


You can view the current power grid information and adjust it at any time based on the consumption demand by clicking the Tesla tower. Can always display the power network when turn on the <color="#FD965ECC">Power network</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Detail display (H)</color>.
FRFR:
In the early stage, you can use Wind turbines to generate electricity. Wind turbines use wind power to generate electricity and do not need to consume fuels. It is a very practical power generation facility for early development. Besides, different planets have different wind energy ratio.


Wind turbines come with a power supply area, but this area is very small. If you want to expand the power grid's supply range, <color="#FD965ECC">you need to use the Tesla tower to transmit and supply power.</color> Different power transmission facilities have different connection lengths and supply areas. You can unlock more advanced power transmission facilities by upgrading Technology.


Power generation facilities that require fuels will consume fuels based on the actual consumption power.


You can view the current power grid information and adjust it at any time based on the consumption demand by clicking the Tesla tower. Can always display the power network when turn on the <color="#FD965ECC">Power network</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Detail display (H)</color>.

Name: 机甲核心能量前字
ZHCN:
机甲在移动、采集、建设、合成物品以及使用自带实验室研究科技时，都会消耗核心能量，核心能量条及数值在屏幕正下方显示。


当核心能量不足时，机甲的所有活动都会受到限制，比如移动速度变慢，无法进行研究等，因此你需要随时关注机甲核心能量的使用情况。一旦核心能量不足，可以点击屏幕右下角的<color="#FD965ECC">“机体面板(C)”</color>按钮打开<color="#FD965ECC">“机体信息面板”</color>，向燃料仓内补充燃料。
ENUS:
The mecha consumes core energy when moving, gathering, building, replicate items, and using its lab research technologies. The core energy bar and value are displayed directly below the screen.


When the core energy is insufficient, all activities will be restricted, such as slower move speed and unable to research, etc. So, you need to pay attention to the use of mecha core energy at any time. Once the core energy is insufficient, you can click the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel (C)</color> button at the bottom-right corner of the screen to open the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel</color> and resupply fuel into the fuel chamber.
FRFR:
The mecha consumes core energy when moving, gathering, building, replicate items, and using its lab research technologies. The core energy bar and value are displayed directly below the screen.


When the core energy is insufficient, all activities will be restricted, such as slower move speed and unable to research, etc. So, you need to pay attention to the use of mecha core energy at any time. Once the core energy is insufficient, you can click the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel (H)</color> button at the bottom-right corner of the screen to open the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel</color> and resupply fuel into the fuel chamber.

Name: 机甲核心能量后字
ZHCN:
机甲核心能量的回复主要通过燃烧室将燃料的能量转化为核心能量。燃烧室的功率越大，能量回复的速度也就越快。


前期，采集星球上的树木、植物可以获得<color="#FD965ECC">木材</color>、<color="#FD965ECC">植物燃料</color>这两种初级燃料，<color="#FD965ECC">煤</color>也是一种不错的燃料选择。
高级燃料除了比低级燃料所蕴含的能量更多以外，还会对机甲燃烧室功率有额外提升，使机甲能更快速的回复能量。


除了燃烧室以外，机甲核心还自带一个微弱的供电功率。


你可以将鼠标移动到能量槽右边的数值上查看能量的具体使用细节。
ENUS:
Converting fuel energy into core energy through the Fuel chamber will recover the core energy of the mecha. The Fuel chamber's power is higher, the speed of energy recovery is faster.


In the early stage, gathering trees and plants on the planet can obtain two primary fuels: <color="#FD965ECC">Logs</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Plant fuels</color>. <color="#FD965ECC">Coals</color> are also good fuel choices.
High-grade fuels not only contain more energy than low-grade fuel, but they also increase the mecha fuel power, allowing the mecha to recover energy more quickly.


In addition to the Fuel chamber, the mecha core also comes with a weak power generation.


You can move the mouse to the value at the right of the core energy bar to view the specific usage details.
FRFR:
Converting fuel energy into core energy through the Fuel chamber will recover the core energy of the mecha. The Fuel chamber's power is higher, the speed of energy recovery is faster.


In the early stage, gathering trees and plants on the planet can obtain two primary fuels: <color="#FD965ECC">Logs</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Plant fuels</color>. <color="#FD965ECC">Coals</color> are also good fuel choices.
High-grade fuels not only contain more energy than low-grade fuel, but they also increase the mecha fuel power, allowing the mecha to recover energy more quickly.


In addition to the Fuel chamber, the mecha core also comes with a weak power generation.


You can move the mouse to the value at the right of the core energy bar to view the specific usage details.

Name: 矩阵研究站介绍前字
ZHCN:
矩阵研究站是真实世界与主脑连接的枢纽，它有两种工作模式：“矩阵合成”以及“科研模式”。


矩阵合成模式，是指可以利用研究站来制造超级矩阵。
科研模式，则是消耗超级矩阵来研究科技，只能研究需要超级矩阵才能解锁的科技。


一旦选择科研模式，研究站将会自动研究当前正在进行的项目，所有研究站共享一个研究进度。


<color="#FD965ECC">使用多个研究站来同时研究一项科技，将极大的提升科技的研究速度 !</color>
每个研究站将贡献 <color="#FD965ECC">60hash/s</color> 的基础研究速度，必须放入科技所需的所有矩阵材料才能开始研究。
ENUS:
The Matrix lab is the hub of connecting the real world and the CentreBrain. It has two modes: Matrix and Research.


The Matrix mode is to produce matrices.
The Research mode is to consume the supermatrices to research technologies. And can only research the technologies that require the supermatrices to unlock.


Once select the research mode, the Matrix labs will automatically research the currently ongoing technology, and all Matrix labs share the same research progress.


<color="#FD965ECC">This will greatly increase the research speed by using multiple Matrix labs to research the same technology at the same time!</color>


Each Matrix lab contributes a basic research speed of <color="#FD965ECC">60hash/s</color>. Only you put all the matrices required by the technology into the Matrix lab, it will start research.
FRFR:
The Matrix lab is the hub of connecting the real world and the CentreBrain. It has two modes: Matrix and Research.


The Matrix mode is to produce matrices.
The Research mode is to consume the supermatrices to research technologies. And can only research the technologies that require the supermatrices to unlock.


Once select the research mode, the Matrix labs will automatically research the currently ongoing technology, and all Matrix labs share the same research progress.


<color="#FD965ECC">This will greatly increase the research speed by using multiple Matrix labs to research the same technology at the same time!</color>


Each Matrix lab contributes a basic research speed of <color="#FD965ECC">60hash/s</color>. Only you put all the matrices required by the technology into the Matrix lab, it will start research.

Name: 矩阵研究站介绍后字
ZHCN:
<color="#FD965ECC">矩阵研究站除了可以在行星表面进行平铺建造外，还可以在垂直方向上进行搭建。</color>
垂直建造的研究站，只要在下层供应充足的原材料，研究站便将会自动将原材料传至上层，同时将产物运送回第一层。另外，只用设置任意一层的工作模式，其他层的研究站将会自动同步。


（真实世界中的超级矩阵，可以作为主脑维持家园运行的源代码。通过将超级矩阵上传至主脑，经过主脑解析后，将获得的科技传输回来，维持家园运行的同时，又能促进基地发展。）
ENUS:
<color="#FD965ECC">The Matrix labs can be built on the planet's surface, and can also be built in the vertical direction.</color>
Vertically constructed Matrix labs, only supplying sufficient raw materials on the lower level, the Matrix labs will automatically transport the raw materials to the upper level and transport the products back to the first level at the same time. Also, just set the operating mode of any layer, and the Matrix labs on other layers will automatically synchronize.


(The supermatrices are the source codes of the CentreBrain for maintaining the homeworld. By uploading the supermatrices to the CentreBrain, after the CentreBrain analysis, the obtained technology will be transmitted back. You can benefit from promoting the development of the base by operating the homeworld simultaneously.)
FRFR:
<color="#FD965ECC">The Matrix labs can be built on the planet's surface, and can also be built in the vertical direction.</color>
Vertically constructed Matrix labs, only supplying sufficient raw materials on the lower level, the Matrix labs will automatically transport the raw materials to the upper level and transport the products back to the first level at the same time. Also, just set the operating mode of any layer, and the Matrix labs on other layers will automatically synchronize.


(The supermatrices are the source codes of the CentreBrain for maintaining the homeworld. By uploading the supermatrices to the CentreBrain, after the CentreBrain analysis, the obtained technology will be transmitted back. You can benefit from promoting the development of the base by operating the homeworld simultaneously.)

Name: 配方复制操作前字
ZHCN:
<color="#FD965ECC">每个生产设施都需要设置配方，否则将无法工作。</color>


如果需要给同一类型的建筑设置相同的配方（或设置），可以使用<color="#FD965ECC">[＜]</color>键来复制其中一个已设置好配方的生产设施，之后再用鼠标指向另一个需要设置相同配方的生产设施后，按<color="#FD965ECC">[＞]</color>键，便可以粘贴配方。
ENUS:
<color="#FD965ECC">Each production facility needs to set a recipe. Otherwise, it will not work.</color>


If you need to set the same recipe (or settings) for the same type of building, use the <color="#FD965ECC">[＜]</color> key to copy one of the production facilities that has set the recipe. And then, use the mouse to point to another production facility that needs the same recipe, press <color="#FD965ECC">[＞]</color> key to paste.
FRFR:
<color="#FD965ECC">Each production facility needs to set a recipe. Otherwise, it will not work.</color>


If you need to set the same recipe (or settings) for the same type of building, use the <color="#FD965ECC">[＜]</color> key to copy one of the production facilities that has set the recipe. And then, use the mouse to point to another production facility that needs the same recipe, press <color="#FD965ECC">[＞]</color> key to paste.

Name: 传送带和分拣器前字
ZHCN:
<color="#FD965ECC">有了传送带和分拣器，就可以实现自动化了。</color>


不同的生产设施接口不同，一些可以直接连接传送带，比如采矿机；一些则需要使用分拣器将供货设施和收货设施桥接起来，比如电弧熔炉。你可以使用传送带将采矿机内的矿物运送出来，然后再使用分拣器将传送带和电弧熔炉连接起来，这样分拣器就会自动将传送带上的矿物运送至电弧熔炉里进行冶炼。
ENUS:
<color="#FD965ECC">With Conveyor belts and Sorters, you can achieve full automation now.</color>


Different production facilities have different slots. Some can directly connect to conveyor belts, such as Mining machines. Some use the sorters to bridge supply facilities and receiving facilities, such as Smelters. You can Use the Conveyor belts to transport the piled-up ores from the Mining machines, and then use the Sorters to connect the conveyor belts to the smelters. The Sorters can deliver the ores from the Conveyor Belts to the smelters for automatic smelting.
FRFR:
<color="#FD965ECC">With Conveyor belts and Sorters, you can achieve full automation now.</color>


Different production facilities have different slots. Some can directly connect to conveyor belts, such as Mining machines. Some use the sorters to bridge supply facilities and receiving facilities, such as Smelters. You can Use the Conveyor belts to transport the piled-up ores from the Mining machines, and then use the Sorters to connect the conveyor belts to the smelters. The Sorters can deliver the ores from the Conveyor Belts to the smelters for automatic smelting.

Name: 传送带和分拣器后字
ZHCN:
在规划传送带时，通过确定建造的起始点和终点来规划传送带线路。


在规划传送带时，<color="#FD965ECC">使用[↑]将目标高度升高一级，使用[↓]将目标高度下降一级，如果需要重置至地面高度，则按[Keypad.0]。</color>


通常情况下，传送带会自动吸附到可搭接的建筑，<color="#FD965ECC">可以按住[SHIFT]键来忽略吸附。</color>
ENUS:
When putting on conveyor belts, all you need to do is determine the Starting point and the Endpoint to plan the conveyor belt route.
When planning the conveyor belt, <color="#FD965ECC">press [↑] to lift the target height one level, and press [↓] to drop down the target height one level. And if you need to reset to the ground height, press [Keypad.0].</color>


Usually, the conveyor belt will automatically snap to the overlapping buildings. <color="#FD965ECC">You can press and hold the [SHIFT] key to ignore the snapping.</color>
FRFR:
When putting on conveyor belts, all you need to do is determine the Starting point and the Endpoint to plan the conveyor belt route.
When planning the conveyor belt, <color="#FD965ECC">press [↑] to lift the target height one level, and press [↓] to drop down the target height one level. And if you need to reset to the ground height, press [Keypad.0].</color>


Usually, the conveyor belt will automatically snap to the overlapping buildings. <color="#FD965ECC">You can press and hold the [SHIFT] key to ignore the snapping.</color>

Name: 射线接收站工作机制标题
射线接收站工作机制前字
ZHCN:
射线接收站可以接收从戴森球（戴森云）上传输回来的高能射线，它有两种不同的模式：<color="#FD965ECC">“直接发电”</color>以及<color="#FD965ECC">“光子生成”</color>。


直接发电模式，是指射线接收站将接收到的能量直接输出到电网。
<color="#FD965ECC">光子生成模式，升级科技“狄拉克逆变机制”后才能解锁。</color>在光子生成模式下，射线接收站的接收功率×5，并将以这一超高的功率将接收到能量直接转化为“临界光子”。


利用微型粒子对撞机可以很容易的将临界光子逆变为反物质和氢，实现将能量作为反物质来存储。
ENUS:
The ray receiver can receive the high-energy Gamma rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere(Dyson swarm). It has two different modes: <color="#FD965ECC">Power generation</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Photon generation</color>.


Power generation mode means that the ray receiver directly outputs the received energy to the grid.
<color="#FD965ECC">After upgrading the Dirac inversion mechanism technology, you can unlock the Photon generation mode.</color> Under the Photon generation mode, the receiving power of the ray receiver will be five times. Use this ultra-high power can directly convert the received energy into Critical photons.


The Miniature particle collider can easily convert critical photons into antimatter and hydrogen, realizing energy storage as antimatter.
FRFR:
The ray receiver can receive the high-energy Gamma rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere(Dyson swarm). It has two different modes: <color="#FD965ECC">Power generation</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Photon generation</color>.


Power generation mode means that the ray receiver directly outputs the received energy to the grid.
<color="#FD965ECC">After upgrading the Dirac inversion mechanism technology, you can unlock the Photon generation mode.</color> Under the Photon generation mode, the receiving power of the ray receiver will be five times. Use this ultra-high power can directly convert the received energy into Critical photons.


The Miniature particle collider can easily convert critical photons into antimatter and hydrogen, realizing energy storage as antimatter.

Name: 射线接收站工作机制后字
ZHCN:
高能射线在传输过程中，能量会散失，因此，能量从戴森球传向射线接收站时会有一定的传输效率。可以通过升级科技或者让射线接收站持续工作来提高。


每个射线接收站的基础接收功率为5MW，实际接收功率可以通过持续工作或者消耗引力透镜来提高。当射线接收站因处于星球阴面而接收不到射线时，持续接收的进度将会快速下降。


当持续工作进度达到100%时，接收功率×2.5，能量散失在当前的基础上-40%。
<color="#FD965ECC">当放入引力透镜后，接收功率×2。</color>此外，在行星电离层应用科技的作用下，有效接收海拔将延伸至大气层顶端，使其在一个昼夜循环中能够有更多的时间接收到高能射线，从而提高持续工作进度。


考虑以上所有加成因素：
<color="#FD965ECC">直接发电模式的理论最大功率为 25MW</color>
<color="#FD965ECC">光子生成模式的理论最大功率为 125MW</color>


射线接收站的实时接收功率按以上原理确定后，它将向戴森球请求能量。
